title: nInE gatiyenage
sahitya:
nInE gatiyenage vanaja nEtre


caraNam 1    kailAsa embOdu kaNNili kANe mailu vAhana pita etta bOdano kANe
    caraNam 2    satya lOkavembOdu mithyavAgitu kANe etta bOdanu brahma Enu mADali amma
    caraNam 3    sarasija nAbhanu sharadhiyoLa muLugida purandara viTTalana karuNakke pAtreLa
